001package imagingbook.lib.pdf;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004
005import com.lowagie.text.DocumentException;
006import com.lowagie.text.pdf.BaseFont;
007
008import imagingbook.lib.pdf.fonts.type1.RLOC;
009import imagingbook.lib.util.resource.ResourceLocation;
010import imagingbook.lib.util.resource.ResourceLocation.Resource;
011
012/**
013 * This class collects the set of 14 Type-1 standard fonts that every
014 * PS/PDF reader is supposed to have available by default.
015 * The associated resource directory contains both .AFM and .PFB files.
016 * iText/OpenPDF never embeds any of these fonts on the exported PDF,
017 * which may cause problems during pre-press checking, where generally
018 * ALL fonts should be embedded.
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 *
022 */
023public enum Type1CoreFont {
024        
025        Courier("Courier.afm"),
026        CourierBold("Courier-Bold.afm"),
027        CourierBoldOblique("Courier-BoldOblique.afm"),
028        CourierOblique("Courier-Oblique.afm"),  
029        Helvetica("Helvetica.afm"),
030        HelveticaBold("Helvetica-Bold.afm"),
031        HelveticaBoldOblique("Helvetica-BoldOblique.afm"),
032        HelveticaOblique("Helvetica-Oblique.afm"),      
033        TimesRoman("Times-Roman.afm"),
034        TimesBold("Times-Bold.afm"),
035        TimesBoldItalic("Times-BoldItalic.afm"),
036        TimesItalic("Times-Italic.afm"),        
037        Symbol("Symbol.afm"),
038        ZapfDingbats("ZapfDingbats.afm")
039        ;
040        
041        private final String afmName;
042        private BaseFont basefont;
043        
044        private static ResourceLocation Resources = new RLOC(); // location of font resources
045
046        /**
047         * Constructor.
048         * @param afmName the name of the associated AFM file
049         */
050        Type1CoreFont(String afmName) {
051                this.afmName = afmName;
052                this.basefont = null;   // direct initialization makes problems (exception reading reseources)
053        }
054        
055        /** 
056         * Returns the {@link BaseFont} instance associatedwith this enum element.
057         * The font is created when this method is called the first time.
058         * 
059         * @return the {@link BaseFont} instance associated with this font
060         */
061        public BaseFont getBaseFont() {
062                if (basefont == null) {
063                        try {
064                                basefont = BaseFont.createFont(getFontPath(this.afmName), "", BaseFont.EMBEDDED);
065                        } catch (DocumentException | IOException e) { 
066                                System.out.println("Trouble: " + e);
067                        }
068                }
069                return basefont;
070        }
071
072        static String getFontPath(String fileName) {
073                Resource res = Resources.getResource(fileName);
074                return res.getPath().toString();
075        }
076        
077        // -----------------------------------------------
078        
079        public static void main(String[] args) {
080                System.out.println("Anchor is in JAR: " + Resources.insideJAR());
081                for (Type1CoreFont sf : Type1CoreFont.values()) {
082                        System.out.println(sf.toString() + ": " + sf.getBaseFont().getPostscriptFontName());
083                }
084        }
085}
086
